Frequently Asked Questions

General

  1. Why was the groupId changed?
  2. So, why is it not called "maven-<foo>-plugin" anymore?

General

Why was the groupId changed?

com.googlecode was too general (see Choosing your Coordinates and answer from Juven Xu to the plsqlgateway guys).

So, why is it not called "maven-<foo>-plugin" anymore?

Because the maven-plugin-plugin complains that the maven-<foo>-plugin namespace belongs to the Apache Maven Project .
